data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Free kick for Saint-Etienne in the half of Strasbourg.
In the minute 2, Eric Wattellier awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Saint-Etienne at Stade Geoffroy Guichard.
In Saint Etienne a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 3, Saint-Etienne's Denis Bouanga misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Saint Etienne.
Strasbourg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 4, Can Saint-Etienne get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Strasbourg's half?
Eric Wattellier signals a Saint-Etienne throw-in in Strasbourg's half.
Strasbourg have a goal kick.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Strasbourg in the half of Saint-Etienne.
Corner awarded to Strasbourg.
Jeanricner Bellegarde (Strasbourg) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 7, Eric Wattellier signals a free kick to Saint-Etienne.
Strasbourg pushes forward through Lucien Kevin Zohi, whose finish on goal is saved.
Ball safe as Saint-Etienne is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 10, Eric Wattellier signals a free kick to Saint-Etienne in their own half.
Saint-Etienne have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Saint-Etienne goal kick.
In the minute 12, Throw-in Strasbourg.
Free kick for Strasbourg in their own half.
Kenny Lala (Strasbourg) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
In the minute 13, Eric Wattellier signals a free kick to Saint-Etienne in their own half.
Free kick Saint-Etienne.
Goal kick for Saint-Etienne at Stade Geoffroy Guichard.
In the minute 15, Saint-Etienne's Arnaud Nordin is on target but unsuccessful.
Saint-Etienne have been awarded a corner by Eric Wattellier.
Strasbourg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 17, Saint-Etienne to take a throw-in in Strasbourg territory.
Saint-Etienne have been awarded a corner by Eric Wattellier.
Saint-Etienne surge into the attack at Stade Geoffroy Guichard but Koloâ€™s header is off-target.
In the minute 18, Eric Wattellier awards Strasbourg a goal kick.
Can Saint-Etienne capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Strasbourg's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 20, Corner awarded to Saint-Etienne.
Eric Wattellier signals a Saint-Etienne throw-in in Strasbourg's half.
Strasbourg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 21, Saint-Etienne to take a throw-in in Strasbourg territory.
Throw-in for Strasbourg in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 23, Saint-Etienne have been awarded a corner by Eric Wattellier.
Mathieu Debuchy's header is off-target for Saint-Etienne.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Saint Etienne.
In the minute 24, Can Saint-Etienne get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Strasbourg's half?
Strasbourg needs to be cautious. Saint-Etienne have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Saint-Etienne close to the penalty box.
In the minute 25, Eric Wattellier signals a throw-in for Saint-Etienne, close to Strasbourg's area.
Ball safe as Strasbourg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Strasbourg at Stade Geoffroy Guichard.
In the minute 27, Eric Wattellier awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Saint-Etienne in the half of Strasbourg.
Throw-in for Saint-Etienne in the half of Strasbourg.
In the minute 30, Strasbourg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Strasbourg in their own half.
Corner awarded to Strasbourg.
In the minute 32, Eric Wattellier signals a free kick to Saint-Etienne in their own half.
Eric Wattellier awards Strasbourg a goal kick.
Strasbourg to take a throw-in in Saint-Etienne territory.
In the minute 34, Saint-Etienne awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Saint-Etienne in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Strasbourg goal kick.
In the minute 37, Saint-Etienne push forward at Stade Geoffroy Guichard and Mahdi Camara gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Strasbourg defence.
Eric Wattellier signals a Saint-Etienne throw-in in Strasbourg's half.
Strasbourg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 39, Ibrahima Sissoko is booked for the away team.
Free kick in a good position for Saint-Etienne!
Eric Wattellier waits before resuming play because Arnaud Nordin for Saint-Etienne is still down.
In the minute 42, Adil Aouchiche for Saint-Etienne drives towards goal at Stade Geoffroy Guichard. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Saint-Etienne.
Can Saint-Etienne get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Strasbourg's half?
In the minute 43, Throw-in high up the field for Saint-Etienne in Saint Etienne.
Arnaud Nordin is back on his feet again.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 44, Throw-in for Strasbourg in their own half.
Eric Wattellier signals a free kick to Strasbourg just outside Saint-Etienne's area.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In Saint Etienne Strasbourg drive forward through Kenny Lala. His shot is on target but it's saved.
The first half has been concluded at Stade Geoffroy Guichard.
Saint-Etienne's Yvan Neyou has been booked in Saint Etienne.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Stade Geoffroy Guichard.
Throw-in Saint-Etienne.
Throw-in for Strasbourg in the half of Saint-Etienne.
In the minute 47, Throw-in for Saint-Etienne at Stade Geoffroy Guichard.
In Saint Etienne a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ball safe as Saint-Etienne is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 48, Free kick for Saint-Etienne in their own half.
Free kick Strasbourg.
Saint-Etienne awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 50, Arnaud Nordin is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Strasbourg to take a throw-in in Saint-Etienne territory.
In the minute 52, Can Strasbourg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Saint-Etienne's half?
It seems as if Arnaud Nordin is unable to continue. Charles Abi replaces him for the home team.
Strasbourg's Lucien Kevin Zohi gets in a shot on goal at Stade Geoffroy Guichard. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Saint-Etienne have been awarded a corner by Eric Wattellier.
In the minute 54, Goal kick for Strasbourg at Stade Geoffroy Guichard.
Throw-in for Saint-Etienne in their own half.
Eric Wattellier signals a Saint-Etienne throw-in in Strasbourg's half.
In the minute 55, Saint-Etienne have been awarded a penalty...
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Alexander Djiku (Strasbourg) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 57, Goal! Denis Bouanga gives Saint-Etienne the lead from the penalty spot. The score is now 1-0.
Can Strasbourg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Saint-Etienne's half?
Eric Wattellier signals a free kick to Saint-Etienne.
In the minute 61, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Strasbourg make their first substitution with Mehdi Chahiri replacing Lucien Kevin Zohi.
Can Strasbourg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Saint-Etienne's half?
In the minute 63, Eric Wattellier signals a free kick to Saint-Etienne in their own half.
Throw-in Strasbourg.
Eric Wattellier awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 64, Saint-Etienne awarded a free kick in their own half.
Yvan Neyou is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Strasbourg to take a throw-in in Saint-Etienne territory.
In the minute 66, The away team replace Jeanricner Bellegarde with Dimitri Lienard.
Saint-Etienne's Yvan Neyou looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Free kick for Strasbourg in the half of Saint-Etienne.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Strasbourg in the half of Saint-Etienne.
In Saint Etienne, Saint-Etienne push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Strasbourg close to the penalty box.
In the minute 69, Free kick for Strasbourg in the half of Saint-Etienne.
Free kick for Saint-Etienne in their own half.
Yvan Neyou (Saint-Etienne) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Zaydou Youssouf.
In the minute 72, Maxence Rivera is replacing Romain Hamouma for the home team.
Strasbourg are pushing forward but Dimitri Lienard's finish is wide of the goal.
Saint-Etienne have a goal kick.
In the minute 75, Eric Wattellier signals a Saint-Etienne throw-in in Strasbourg's half.
Eric Wattellier signals a free kick to Saint-Etienne in their own half.
Eric Wattellier signals a free kick to Saint-Etienne in their own half.
In the minute 77, Eric Wattellier awards the away team a throw-in.
Strasbourg are coming forward and Mehdi Chahiri gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Saint Etienne.
In the minute 78, Can Strasbourg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Saint-Etienne's half?
Strasbourg are in shooting range from this free kick.
In Saint Etienne, Dimitri Lienard of Strasbourg is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 80, Saint-Etienne needs to be cautious. Strasbourg have an attacking throw-in.
Thierry Laurey (Strasbourg) is making a third substitution, with Idriss Saadi replacing Majeed Waris.
In the minute 81, Eric Wattellier signals a throw-in for Strasbourg, close to Saint-Etienne's area.
In Saint Etienne a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Adrien Thomasson is on a sub for Ibrahima Sissoko for Strasbourg.
Goal! Saint-Etienne extend their lead to 2-0 through Mahdi Camara.
In the minute 84, Saint-Etienne awarded a free kick in their own half.
The match at Stade Geoffroy Guichard has been interrupted briefly for a check on Yvann Macon, who is down injured.
Strasbourg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 86, Saint-Etienne's Yvann Macon is back in action after a slight knock.
Saint-Etienne advance rapidly upfield but Eric Wattellier blows for offside.
Saint-Etienne make their fourth substitution with Kevin Monnet-Paquet replacing Denis Bouanga.
In the minute 87, Claude Puel is making the team's fifth substitution at Stade Geoffroy Guichard with Lucas Gourna Douath replacing Adil Aouchiche.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Saint-Etienne close to the penalty box.
In Saint Etienne Saint-Etienne attack through Zaydou Youssouf. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 89, Eric Wattellier awards Strasbourg a goal kick.
Important block from the Saint-Etienne defence as Adrien Thomasson fires in a strike for Strasbourg.
Throw-in high up the field for Strasbourg in Saint Etienne.
Strasbourg's Mehdi Chahiri gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Saint-Etienne defender.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Strasbourg have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball safe as Strasbourg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Strasbourg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Saint-Etienne's half?
Dimitri Lienard of Strasbourg gets in a strike, but is off target.
Saint-Etienne have a goal kick.
Saint-Etienne to take a throw-in in Strasbourg territory.
Eric Wattellier signals a Strasbourg throw-in in Saint-Etienne's half.
Strasbourg have been awarded a corner by Eric Wattellier.
That's full-time at Stade Geoffroy Guichard. The final score is 2-0.
